Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Enacts the New York fair housing act
Summary: Enacts the New York fair housing act to require municipalities to take affirmative steps to address the creation and maintenance of affordable housing.
LawCode: Add Art 16 §§700 - 723, Pub Hous L; add §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the New York fair housing act
